DOC.brief_summary: This will be a drug-drug interaction study to evaluate the effect of multiple oral doses of GLPG0634 on the single dose pharmacokinetic profile of midazolam administered in fasted normal healthy males. Each subject will receive a single oral dose of midazolam (2 mg) on 2 occasions: on Day 1, before dosing with GLPG0634 and on Day 8, after multiple oral doses of GLPG0634 (daily for 7 days). Also, the safety and tolerability of multiple oral doses of GLPG0634 co-administered with midazolam in healthy male subjects will be evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I, Open Interaction Study Between GLPG0634 and Midazolam in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: male, between 40 and 60 years of age, inclusive within BMI range 18 to 30 kg/m2, inclusive Any condition that might interfere with the procedures or tests in this study Drug or alcohol abuse Smoking
